```{r data, include=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
df <- read.csv("data/individual_scores.csv", stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
pl_agg <- df %>%
  group_by(Game, Player, Team) %>%
  summarize(`Total Points` = sum(Score),
            `Points (3s)` = sum(Score[Score == 3]),
            `Points (2s)` = sum(Score[Score == 2]),
            `Total Buckets` = length(Score),
            `Total 3s` = length(Score[Score == 3]),
            `Total 2s` = length(Score[Score == 2]))

get_transform <- function(df){
  tmp <- df %>%
    group_by(Player) %>%
    summarize(`Points (2s)` = sum(Score[Score == 2]),
              `Points (3s)` = sum(Score[Score == 3]),
              `Total Points` = sum(Score)) %>%
    t() %>%
    as.data.frame(stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
  #tmp <- data.frame(tmp)
  names(tmp) <- tmp[1,]
  tmp <- tmp[-1,]
  return(tmp)
}
```
